meta.description: Paddle is a payments and billing platform for SaaS companies, handling subscriptions, payments, tax compliance, and billing operations via API.

options.label: Product
options.description: Manage products in your catalog - create new products, retrieve product details, list products, and update product information

options.label: Prices
options.description: Manage pricing for products and services - create, retrieve, list, and update price configurations

options.label: Discounts
options.description: Configure discount strategies - create discount codes, retrieve discount details, list available discounts, and update discount parameters

options.label: Discount Groups
options.description: Discount group entities let you organize your discounts by grouping them together.

options.label: Customers
options.description: Handle customer data - create new customers, retrieve customer details, list all customers, and update customer information

options.label: Addresses
options.description: Manage customer billing addresses - create, retrieve, list, and update address information for customers

options.label: Businesses
options.description: Manage customer business information - create, retrieve, list, and update business details including tax information and contacts

options.label: Payment Methods
options.description: Manage customer payment methods - retrieve, list, and delete saved payment methods for customers

options.label: Transactions
options.description: Manage payment transactions - create, retrieve, list, update, and preview transactions for one-time purchases and subscription billing

options.label: Subscriptions
options.description: Manage recurring subscriptions - create charges, retrieve details, list subscriptions, update billing, pause, resume, and cancel subscriptions

options.label: Adjustments
options.description: Manage transaction adjustments - create and list credit notes, refunds, and other adjustments for completed transactions

options.label: Pricing Preview
options.description: Preview pricing calculations - calculate prices, taxes, and discounts for transactions without creating actual transactions

options.label: Reports
options.description: Generate and manage business reports - create, retrieve, list, and download reports for transactions, revenue, and other business metrics

options.label: Event Types
options.description: List available event types - get all event types that can be used for webhook notifications and integrations

options.label: Events
options.description: List system events - retrieve a log of all events that occurred in your Paddle account for auditing and tracking

options.label: Notification Settings
options.description: Manage webhook endpoints - create, retrieve, list, update, and delete notification destinations for receiving event webhooks

options.label: Notifications
options.description: List webhook notifications - retrieve and track notifications sent by Paddle to your configured webhook endpoints

options.label: Notification Logs
options.description: List notification delivery logs - track webhook delivery attempts, success rates, and troubleshoot notification delivery issues

options.label: Simulation Types
options.description: List simulation types - get available simulation types for testing different webhook scenarios and event flows

options.label: Simulations
options.description: List and retrieve simulations - manage webhook testing simulations to validate your integration before going live

options.label: Simulation Runs
options.description: Manage simulation executions - create, list, and retrieve simulation runs to test webhook event delivery

options.label: Simulation Run Events
options.description: Manage simulation events - list, retrieve, and replay individual events generated during simulation runs for testing

options.label: Custom
options.description: Make custom API calls - call any Paddle API endpoint not covered by the standard resource operations
